meanings.definition: A carbonic anhydrase inhibitor used to treat glaucoma and certain types of seizures.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed acetazolamides to help with my glaucoma.
meanings.sent2: Patients with seizures may benefit from taking acetazolamides as part of their treatment.
meanings.sent3: When the glaucoma drops forgot their job, the acetazolamides stepped in to save the day.
meanings.sent4: The acetazolamides acted like a shield, protecting the eyes from the harmful effects of glaucoma.
meanings.sent5: As I swallowed the acetazolamides, I imagined them as tiny warriors fighting against my eye condition.
